title: Love the app, but lose the extra launcher icon
comment: Love the app and all the options it gives, like the dominant color or granular refresh (time/if on WiFi or not). It's a relatively small thing sure, but none of the other Muzei plugins I have installed have their own (I have a few, so that would make my launcher a mess!). Is onboarding without that icon really that bad that it really needs the extra icon? Not regretting the IAP, or the rating. Just that for me that icon makes me want to grab the wallpapers and use dropzei or some other DIY solution.
Amaze
i bought the full version :-)

title: It has become almost impossible to select
comment: App asked to go website but there is no option to choose the images.
It has never been possible to select the image, this is the purpose of Muzei, we do that for you. The website is a showcase of the artworks and allow you to input captions. Thanks

Great, but why does it show an icon in the drawer? Every other muzei extension doesnt, this is the only one with an icon and I really don't like that. Its pointless and takes up space. Would get 5 stars if this is fixed. EDIT: okay, that makes sense, thanks for the reply. But perhaps you could have an option to hide the icon in the preferences? Just an idea.

It is for onboarding purpose, I had too many complains from users that installed the ghibli extension without installing Muzei Live Wallpaper. I hope you will understand. Thanks
EDIT: Unfortunately This is not possible to hide an icon at runtime, it is statically declared in the application manifest.

title: 😍
comment: This is beautiful... I love studio Ghibli movies SO much and this way I never get tired of a wallpaper, it changes itself before I even start to think of maybe getting tired of the wallpaper Cannot wait for V2! :D

I am not sure, the v2 (coming very very soon) will contain ~350 artworks ;). The current v1 have ~70 artworks.
Thanks

title: Good

title: Good app, but missing one thing.
comment: All I would like is the title of the movie whatever wallpaper is taken from to be shown in the app.

Hi
For titles, a website is ready at this url http://muzeighibli.net (better on desktop).
Basically after google+ sign-in each user will have the possibility to submit a caption for each artwork. When an artworks as enough similar captions it will feed the extension.
PS: this is a preview version, not all the artworks are here.
Thanks

title: Awesome
comment: Now works with 4.1! ^^

title: Love it, but needs improvement
comment: It works well enough, but the photos are never centered on my HTC One, so I'm always looking at the far left of the image, not the usually more interesting center. Also, it'd be great if we had the option to not blur the photos.  EDIT: We DO have the option not to blur the photos. Although it's hidden away in the Muzei settings. This just upped the app to 5 stars in my book!

Muzei Ghibli is an extension for Muzei Live Wallpaper, all your improvements relate to it : http://get.muzei.co
For the blur, you can already configure it, go in "Customize" tap on "Choose source" combo box and go to "advanced".
For the image not centered I believe it will be centered by default in the next Muzei Live Wallpaper release.
Thanks
Lovely

title: Well..

Thanks
